job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Full time, remote opportunity for a Software Engineer. This role will be responsible for developing multi-tiered product solutions and web services for SaaS applications. You will be an integral part of a growing team at a very successful software firm.  This is a permanent role with an excellent compensation and benefits package. 100% remote opportunity.  Requirements:4+ years of full stack software development experience with:Web frameworks- (such as Django, Ruby on Rails, Flask, Express, Spring MVC, etc.)Database experienceExperience with one of the following- Python, Javascript, Ruby, Java, Go, etc.Knowledge of CI/CDPreferred- REST, Test driven development, Javascript, GITBachelor’s Degree or equivalent work experience If you are interested in this Software Developer opportunity, please apply to this post or email your resume directly to Dan Gilliam, email: dan.gilliam@cannonsearch.com.  Keys: Software Developer, Software Engineer, Full stack Developer, SaaS, Amazon, Azure, Cloud, software development, web services
